imgDesc.text:
You finally get to go on an adventure with Aranaga, Aranakin, and Aragaru.
Use the Kusava at the appropriate places to call upon the powers of the 3 Aranara. By <color=#ffe14b>switching</color> the abilities of the Kusava, you can choose the Aranara whose help you need. Delve deeper into Mawtiyima alongside your Aranara friends!
